description: Students in this course will learn the process of identifying and developing a research proposal
focused on a significant question in ecosystem science. We will discuss how to generate good
research questions and hypotheses, find and synthesize important literature sources from the
library, and develop a research plan. The final produce of student activities will be a research
proposal. Students will also lead and participate in discussions of current literature in ecosystem
science. The content of the course will be determined in part by student interest, within the
constraint that topics must address an important concept in the study of ecosystems.
fullname: Advanced Research Topics in Environmental Studies
